about_paragraph:
I am a computer science student and a curious Full Stack developer passionate about web and technology. What drives me is the desire to constantly learn and build projects that are both useful and visually appealing. I particularly enjoy everything related to web development and databases, where I can combine logic and creativity.
 
 Outside of development, I love alpine skiing, traveling, and discovering new cultures, anything that helps me learn and see the world from new perspectives.
contact_info_text: Feel free to reach out to me through any of the following channels. I will respond as soon as possible!
contact_popup_message:
Thank you for your message!
I will get back to you as soon as possible.
footer_description: Full Stack Developer in Quebec, Canada
